name: Elemental Royale
description:
Optional:

Gloves made of non-conductive material

A Makey Makey

Alligator wires

Aluminum foil

Two wizards battle each other with elemental minions that must battle each other to the death. Fight for your glory, fight for your honor, or fight to win!

Controls:

Player 1: Arrow keys to move/jump, down arrow to fire projectiles

Player 2: WAD to move/jump, S to fire projectiles

If players wish to utilize the makey makey version, some setup is required
